product_name: SmartWool Piney Lake Henley Sweater - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With casual style that looks great anywhere, the SmartWool Piney Lake Henley Sweater offers lightweight, breathable coverage for complete comfort in cool or warm weather. Piney Lake Henley sweater has a jersey knit body with rib-knit cuffs and hem; decorative buttons complement the neckline. SmartWool process ensures soft, breathable insulation that doesn't shrink when washed. Semifitted cut is not too tight and not too loose. Hand wash in cold water and lay flat to dry. Closeout.
short_description: With casual style that looks great anywhere, the SmartWool Piney Lake Henley Sweater offers lightweight, breathable coverage for complete comfort in cool or warm weather.
